title: Intermediate Conversation and Grammar Enhancement Course Using an Arabic Virtual Learning Platform

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment where virtual platforms are used as supplementary tools in a smartphone-centric limited-technology setting, linked with offline classes.

learning_goals: Intermediate Arabic learners achieve CEFR B1-level speaking and grammar proficiency after 6 months.
Learners complete interactive quizzes provided on virtual platforms with over 80% accuracy.
Learners sustain topic presentations and Q&A sessions in Arabic for over 10 minutes during weekly offline discussion sessions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
